title: DPWS Printing/Scanning
body: The built-in support for some DPWS devices would be nice, especially printing to WSD printers (or capturing images from WSD scanners) would be a significant feature. Implementing such protocol is not impossible and printing from applications would be welcome not only by developers but by end users as well - once available in Office applications etc.

comments.body: More generally: windows phone has no embedded functionality to print (skydrive, networked printer)
